name: Tales of Phantasy: a Sonic and Klonoa RPG
name_original: Tales of Phantasy: a Sonic and Klonoa RPG
description:
Hello and welcome! this is a fan rpg that stars sonic and klonoa characters in a fantasy/sci-fi adventure hears a idea of the games story

(note this is subject to change later on )

Story/Setting: (W.I.P./Concept)
One peaceful day Klonoa and his friends are on they're way to Lolo's graduation ceremony from being a priestess-in-training. however during the Ceremony, Janga an extremely dangerous villain, attacks with an army of strange robots in Search of some powerful artifacts that's hidden with in the church. The High Priestess, knowing what Janga is after manages to give Klonoa one of the artifacts knowing that it would be safe with him however being overrun by robots Janga manages to steal one of them and retreats. Klonoa and friends follow him but end up falling right in to Janga's trap. using a strange device he creates a portal that sucks everyone in to it. In a last attempt to stop him, Klonoa throws his boomerang to stop the machines, but he only manages to change where they would end up. As it returned to him it strikes Janga in the back knocking him and the artifact in to the portal with them. Ending up on different parts of Mobius they each meet up with different sonic characters to help find they're way home. however as they travel around they end up finding out that there's alot more going on then Janga causing trouble. they'll have to work together, learn and gain new powers and magic in order not to save only Lunatea but Mobius and Earth as well.
